resources.string: %s requests microphone permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can record voice or shoot videos to send to friends, use audio/video calling features, etc.
Microphone permission not enabled
Enable microphone permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use voice, video, and audio/video calling features normally.
%s requests camera permission

After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can take photos or videos to send to friends, use video calling, group live streaming and other features. You can also access the camera to take photos and videos in other scenarios.
Camera permission not enabled
Enable camera permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use photo, video, and scanning features normally.
%s requests bluetooth permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls.
Bluetooth permission not enabled
Enable bluetooth permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to use Bluetooth devices for audio/video calls normally.
%s requests photo access permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can access your photo album to send photos to friends, update profile pictures, etc.
Photo access permission not enabled
Enable photo permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send photos, update profile pictures and use other features normally.
%s requests video access permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can access your photo album to send videos to friends, etc.
Video access permission not enabled
Enable video permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send videos and use other features normally.
%s requests external storage access permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can access your photo album to send images, videos to friends, update profile pictures, etc.
External storage access permission not enabled
Enable external storage access permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send images, videos, files, update profile pictures and use other features normally.
%s requests notification permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, when the app is running in the background and receives messages, it will be able to send notification alerts
Notification permission not enabled
Enable notification permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to receive message notification alerts in time.
%s requests location permission
After selecting Allow in the popup below, you can send location messages
Location permission not enabled
Enable location permission in Settings - Apps - %s - Permissions to send location messages.
